articles.content:
Personnel of the Land Transportation Office (LTO), backed by agents of the National Bureau of Investigation (NBI) confiscated more than 65 right-hand drive motor vehicles in a raid on autoparts supply store in Talisay City in Cebu on Monday, June 9.

articles.description: Oklahoma City keeps its foot on the gas, getting a big performance from SGA – and Aaron Wiggins off the bench – while Tyrese Haliburton sputters.
articles.content:

articles.title: Apple may reveal all-new liquid glass interface at WWDC 2025 to polish up iOS and macOS: Details
articles.description: Apple is expected to unveil a new “Liquid Glass” interface at WWDC 2025, giving iOS, macOS, and other platforms a glossy redesign ahead of the iPhone’s 20th anniversary.

articles.title: Chinese aircraft carrier group enters waters near Japan’s easternmost island for first time
articles.description: The Liaoning carrier, accompanied by two missile destroyers and a supply ship, entered Japan’s exclusive economic zone before exiting to conduct military drills
articles.content:
A Chinese aircraft carrier group has entered an area of Japan’s territorial waters for the first time, prompting concern in Tokyo over China’s expanding naval reach.

articles.description: The Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP) on Monday announced free admission to the Museo BSP, the repository and custodian of the country’s numismatic heritage.

articles.description: Police will allege four people were involved in an elaborate money laundering scheme that smuggled cash around the country.
articles.content:

articles.title: Healthy lifestyle, balanced diet & exercise may help brain tumour risk
articles.description: Brain tumours affect many globally. Early detection, advanced imaging, and modern treatments offer better outcomes and awareness is key.
articles.content:
Brain tumour affects several people across the world each year, and to raise awareness about the condition and its related complications, World Brain Tumour Day is observed on June 8 every year.

articles.title: Mumbai train accident: Five dead after falling off local train due to overcrowding
articles.description: Mumbai train accident: Five commuters killed falling off overcrowded train near Mumbra; investigation underway by railway administration and police.
articles.content:
